name: Cartman's Authoritah
summary:
Play as South Park's Eric Cartman in this side scrolling platform game.
Attack the bad guys with 5 different weapons including baton, rifle, flame thrower, rocket launcher and V-chip. Go for the money shots, witness the wow moments and fight your way through 8 levels and hidden bonus areas to finish the game.
